title: Store Expansion & Site Acquisition Officer
description: As an Offline Store Expansion Officer at EIGER, your mission is to spearhead the growth and expansion of our physical store network. You will be responsible for identifying and evaluating potential store locations, managing site acquisition processes, and overseeing the development of new retail spaces. Your role is crucial in ensuring that EIGER continues to expand its footprint in key markets, delivering exceptional shopping experiences to our customers.

company.name: PT Eigerindo MPI
company.description: At Eigerindo MPI, we pride ourselves on being the premier destination for outdoor enthusiasts seeking high-quality gear and fashion. With a commitment to excellence in retail, we curate a diverse range of top-tier brands, offering an extensive collection of outdoor products across our numerous stores and online platforms.
company.address: Jl. Raya Terusan Kopo KM.11,5, No.127A, Pangauban, Kec. Katapang, Kabupaten Bandung, Jawa Barat

responsibilities: 1. Market Research: Conduct thorough market research to identify high-potential areas for new store locations. Analyze market trends, demographic data, and competitor presence to make informed site selection decisions.

2. Site Evaluation: Assess potential store sites based on various factors, including foot traffic, accessibility, visibility, and alignment with brand standards. Conduct site visits and feasibility studies to determine suitability.

3. Negotiations and Acquisitions: Lead negotiations with property owners, landlords, and real estate agents to secure favorable lease terms and conditions. Manage the acquisition process from initial contact to final agreement.

4. Project Management: Oversee the development and opening of new stores, coordinating with internal teams and external contractors. Ensure projects are completed on time, within budget, and to EIGER’s quality standards.

5. Regulatory Compliance: Ensure all new store openings comply with local regulations, zoning laws, and corporate policies. Obtain necessary permits and approvals for store construction and operation.
6. Financial Analysis: Prepare financial models and projections to assess the potential return on investment for new store locations. Present findings and recommendations to senior management.

7. Strategic Planning: Contribute to the development of the company’s expansion strategy, aligning new store openings with overall business objectives. Identify opportunities for growth and recommend strategic initiatives.

8. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain detailed records of site evaluations, negotiations, project timelines, and financial analyses. Provide regular updates and reports to stakeholders on the progress of expansion projects.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams on high-impact projects that contribute to the success of our organization. These projects will challenge you to think critically, solve complex problems, and apply your skills in a real-world retail setting.

Build a strong professional network by connecting with peers, mentors, and senior leaders within our organization. Engage in networking events, workshops, and industry conferences to broaden your exposure and stay informed about the latest trends and best practices in the retail industry.

requirements: Must be possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in any major with min. GPA 3.25
Min. 1 year experience (preferable in retail industry) Active in organization / have internship exp
Passion for the fashion retail industry and a genuine interest in pursuing a leadership career in the sector.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders at all levels.
Strong business acumen, target & customer oriented with the ability to analyze data, identify trends, selling strategy, coordinate a team and make informed decisions.
Adaptability, resilience, and a growth mindset to thrive in a fast-paced, ever-changing retail environment.
Flexibility to relocate and work in different locations as required by the rotational assignments.
Willing to work on weekend / holidays
Willing to be placed in any EIGER ADVENTURE STORE

title: CREATIVE DESIGNER INTERN
description: Bertanggungjawab dalam menyusun konsep dan menjalankan proyek desain di berbagai media, termasuk cetak, digital, dan multimedia.

company.name: PT LION SUPER INDO
company.description:
"Sejak tahun 1997, Super Indo telah bertumbuh dan berkembang di Indonesia melalui kemitraan bersama Ahold Delhaize yang berasal dari Belanda dan Salim Group dari Indonesia. Didukung oleh karyawan yang terlatih, Super Indo berhasil menyediakan berbagai macam barang kebutuhan sehari-hari berkualitas tinggi dengan harga ekonomis.

Super Indo selalu menjaga kesegaran dan kualitas produk dengan cara memilih produsen yang baik dan juga menetapkan prosedur operasi standar yang selalu kami pantau. Super Indo juga berkomitmen untuk mengembangkan ekonomi lokal dengan menjalin kemitraan dengan petani lokal dan memberdayakan Usaha Mikro, Kecil, dan Menengah (UMKM) yang menyuplai produk berkualitas di gerai Super Indo. Hal ini membuat Super Indo menjadi pilihan terbaik untuk berbelanja karena kami lebih segar, lebih hemat, dan lebih dekat.

Kami percaya bahwa Super Indo tidak hanya memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik dan produk yang berkualitas tinggi, tetapi juga memberikan kontribusi positif bagi komunitas dan menjadi bagian masyarakat yang lebih baik. Hal ini tercermin dari rangkaian kegiatan rutin kami yang mempromosikan gaya hidup sehat, aksi filantropi, hingga zero waste management.

Dengan pertumbuhan yang memprioritaskan keberlanjutan, Super Indo selalu membuka peluang kerja untuk masyarakat Indonesia. Super Indo percaya bahwa untuk menginspirasi masyarakat dalam mengembangkan potensi karir adalah membuat lingkungan kerja yang sehat dan inklusif. Seluruh karyawan di Super Indo berkomitmen untuk selalu belajar, berkembang, dan meraih kesuksesan dengan memelihara nilai-nilai Keberanian (Courage), Integritas (Integrity), Kerjasama (Teamwork), Kepedulian (Care), dan Humor (Humor).

Ayo bergabung dan berkembang bersama keluarga besar PT Lion Super Indo!

Better place to work, better place to shop, better neighbor."
company.address: Menara Bidakara 2, 19th – 22nd Floor Jalan Jend. Gatot Soebroto Kav.71-73 Jakarta Selatan 12870

responsibilities: Bertanggungjawab dalam menyusun konsep dan menjalankan proyek desain di berbagai media, termasuk cetak, digital, dan multimedia.
requirements: Mahasiswa aktif dari jurusan Desain Grafis, Desain Komunikasi Visual, atau jurusan terkait
Memiliki laptop pribadi
Memiliki portofolio yang menampilkan bakat kreatif dan beragam proyek desain
Mampu menggunakan dengan aplikasi Adobe Software, Canva & Capcut
Mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik
Mampu untuk bekerja secara mandiri dan dalam tim
Mampu bekerja dengan deadline tertentu

title: DIGITAL BACK END DEVELOPER
description: Bertanggung jawab untuk memenuhi kebutuhan pelanggan terkait aplikasi My Super Indo melalui keterlibatan dalam merancang aplikasi terkait.

company.name: PT LION SUPER INDO
company.description:
"Sejak tahun 1997, Super Indo telah bertumbuh dan berkembang di Indonesia melalui kemitraan bersama Ahold Delhaize yang berasal dari Belanda dan Salim Group dari Indonesia. Didukung oleh karyawan yang terlatih, Super Indo berhasil menyediakan berbagai macam barang kebutuhan sehari-hari berkualitas tinggi dengan harga ekonomis.

Super Indo selalu menjaga kesegaran dan kualitas produk dengan cara memilih produsen yang baik dan juga menetapkan prosedur operasi standar yang selalu kami pantau. Super Indo juga berkomitmen untuk mengembangkan ekonomi lokal dengan menjalin kemitraan dengan petani lokal dan memberdayakan Usaha Mikro, Kecil, dan Menengah (UMKM) yang menyuplai produk berkualitas di gerai Super Indo. Hal ini membuat Super Indo menjadi pilihan terbaik untuk berbelanja karena kami lebih segar, lebih hemat, dan lebih dekat.

Kami percaya bahwa Super Indo tidak hanya memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik dan produk yang berkualitas tinggi, tetapi juga memberikan kontribusi positif bagi komunitas dan menjadi bagian masyarakat yang lebih baik. Hal ini tercermin dari rangkaian kegiatan rutin kami yang mempromosikan gaya hidup sehat, aksi filantropi, hingga zero waste management.

Dengan pertumbuhan yang memprioritaskan keberlanjutan, Super Indo selalu membuka peluang kerja untuk masyarakat Indonesia. Super Indo percaya bahwa untuk menginspirasi masyarakat dalam mengembangkan potensi karir adalah membuat lingkungan kerja yang sehat dan inklusif. Seluruh karyawan di Super Indo berkomitmen untuk selalu belajar, berkembang, dan meraih kesuksesan dengan memelihara nilai-nilai Keberanian (Courage), Integritas (Integrity), Kerjasama (Teamwork), Kepedulian (Care), dan Humor (Humor).

Ayo bergabung dan berkembang bersama keluarga besar PT Lion Super Indo!

Better place to work, better place to shop, better neighbor."
company.address: Menara Bidakara 2, 19th – 22nd Floor Jalan Jend. Gatot Soebroto Kav.71-73 Jakarta Selatan 12870

Memiliki kemampuan analitis yang baik
Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik
Memiliki pengetahuan dalam pemrograman database dengan tools DB Programming (PostgreSQL), Optional: MS SQL Server, MySQL, SQLite
Backend troubleshooting menggunakan API, Scheduler, Crashlytics
Memiliki pengalaman bekerja dalam tim yang berorientasi produk (AGILE & DevOps), dan membuat program test-script
Akan lebih baik jika memahami Bahasa Inggris
Memiliki pengetahuan tentang Odoo dan SAP merupakan nilai tambah

"Sejak tahun 1997, Super Indo telah bertumbuh dan berkembang di Indonesia melalui kemitraan bersama Ahold Delhaize yang berasal dari Belanda dan Salim Group dari Indonesia. Didukung oleh karyawan yang terlatih, Super Indo berhasil menyediakan berbagai macam barang kebutuhan sehari-hari berkualitas tinggi dengan harga ekonomis.

Super Indo selalu menjaga kesegaran dan kualitas produk dengan cara memilih produsen yang baik dan juga menetapkan prosedur operasi standar yang selalu kami pantau. Super Indo juga berkomitmen untuk mengembangkan ekonomi lokal dengan menjalin kemitraan dengan petani lokal dan memberdayakan Usaha Mikro, Kecil, dan Menengah (UMKM) yang menyuplai produk berkualitas di gerai Super Indo. Hal ini membuat Super Indo menjadi pilihan terbaik untuk berbelanja karena kami lebih segar, lebih hemat, dan lebih dekat.

Kami percaya bahwa Super Indo tidak hanya memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik dan produk yang berkualitas tinggi, tetapi juga memberikan kontribusi positif bagi komunitas dan menjadi bagian masyarakat yang lebih baik. Hal ini tercermin dari rangkaian kegiatan rutin kami yang mempromosikan gaya hidup sehat, aksi filantropi, hingga zero waste management.

Dengan pertumbuhan yang memprioritaskan keberlanjutan, Super Indo selalu membuka peluang kerja untuk masyarakat Indonesia. title: BINA BNI

company.name: PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Tbk
company.text: pt bank negara indonesia persero tbk
company.description:
"PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Tbk adalah Bank Milik Negara yang pertama didirikan dan berfungsi sebagai Bank Sentral dan Bank Umum pada tanggal 5 Juli 1946 dan saat ini dikenal sebagai BNI 46. Kini BNI telah tumbuh dan berkembang menjadi bank nasional yang solid dengan kinerja keuangan yang berkelanjutan.

Dengan slogan ‘Melayani Negeri, Kebanggaan Bangsa’, BNI terus meningkatkan kontribusi dan inovasinya bagi kemajuan bangsa dan negara, saat ini dan di masa yang akan mendatang, melalui segmen korporasi maupun segmen konsumer untuk melayani negeri dan masyarakat dari seluruh pelosok hingga mancanegara.

Pada akhir tahun 2023, BNI mempekerjakan lebih dari 27.000 pegawai yang berkompeten. Untuk melayani nasabahnya, BNI memanfaatkan jaringan layanannya yang luas, terdiri dari 2.122 outlet domestik dan 9 cabang luar negeri di Singapura, Hong Kong, Tokyo, New York, London, Seoul, Osaka, Amsterdam, & Sydney. Melalui keberadaan BNI di kota finansial dunia, BNI berkomitmen untuk “menjembatani Indonesia dan Dunia”. BNI senantiasa berupaya menjadi bank pilihan dengan memberikan layanan prima dan solusi bernilai tinggi kepada seluruh nasabahnya.

Selain itu, BNI didukung pula oleh Perusahaan Anak yang memperkuat layanan finansial secara terpadu yaitu antara lain : BNI Multifinance, BNI Sekuritas dan Entitas Anak perusahaannya (BNI Asset Management dan BNI Securities Pte Limited Singapura/BSPL), BNI Life, BNI Remittance, Bank Mayora dan BNI Ventures."
company.address: Gedung Grha BNI Jl. Jenderal Sudirman Kav. 1. Jakarta Pusat 10220

Pria/Wanita berpenampilan menarik
Pendidikan:
a.     SMA/SMK        : nilai rata-rata rapor tahun terakhir smt 5 & 6 min 7
b.     D1-S1               : IPK min 2.5
Umur 18 s/d 25 tahun
Sehat jasmani dan rohani
Mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik
Tidak pernah terlibat narkoba atau pelanggaran hukum, yang dibuktikan dengan Surat Keterangan Catatan Kepolisian (SKCK)
Mendapatkan persetujuan orang tua mengikuti program pemagangan Bina BNI

title: Product Management Intern, Discovery
description:
We think you also hate when travel app is giving you a headache, right? A slight misinformation can ruin the trip.

That is exactly what we are tackling as t-fam! Making sure that our 50+ million users have the best experience in crafting their own adventure.

company.name: tiket.com
company.description:
tiket.com is the pioneer of online travel agent (OTA) in Indonesia established in 2011. tiket.com is one of the largest and most comprehensive online travel companies in Indonesia, offering a full spectrum of travel products and services core to the travel experience, ranging from flights, ground transport, accommodations, attractions, activities, event ticketing, and travel essentials. tiket.com’s mission is to accommodate the best access for online travel booking through web and mobile applications.

In 2017, tiket.com became an affiliated company of Blibli and by 2021 became a consolidating subsidiary of Blibli. Blibli has a unified omnichannel ecosystem known as Blibli Tiket, consisting of its subsidiary entities, tiket.com, and Ranch Market. This is to emphasize the synergies within the ecosystem that provide convenience and added value for customers by offering more comprehensive, beneficial, and integrated services across every channel and platform. In 2022, Blibli's shares were officially listed and traded on the Indonesia Stock Exchange (“IDX”) under the stock code "BELI."

tiket.com is the fastest-growing OTA in the world by Sabre and rated the fastest Net Promoter Score (NPS) growth for OTA among its peers, according to a survey done by Jakpat.
company.address: Jakarta Barat

tiket.com is the pioneer of online travel agent (OTA) in Indonesia established in 2011. tiket.com is one of the largest and most comprehensive online travel companies in Indonesia, offering a full spectrum of travel products and services core to the travel experience, ranging from flights, ground transport, accommodations, attractions, activities, event ticketing, and travel essentials. tiket.com’s mission is to accommodate the best access for online travel booking through web and mobile applications.

In 2017, tiket.com became an affiliated company of Blibli and by 2021 became a consolidating subsidiary of Blibli. Blibli has a unified omnichannel ecosystem known as Blibli Tiket, consisting of its subsidiary entities, tiket.com, and Ranch Market. This is to emphasize the synergies within the ecosystem that provide convenience and added value for customers by offering more comprehensive, beneficial, and integrated services across every channel and platform. In 2022, Blibli's shares were officially listed and traded on the Indonesia Stock Exchange (“IDX”) under the stock code "BELI."

title: ODP General Banking BNI

company.name: PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Tbk
company.text: pt bank negara indonesia persero tbk
company.description:
"PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Tbk adalah Bank Milik Negara yang pertama didirikan dan berfungsi sebagai Bank Sentral dan Bank Umum pada tanggal 5 Juli 1946 dan saat ini dikenal sebagai BNI 46. Kini BNI telah tumbuh dan berkembang menjadi bank nasional yang solid dengan kinerja keuangan yang berkelanjutan.

Dengan slogan ‘Melayani Negeri, Kebanggaan Bangsa’, BNI terus meningkatkan kontribusi dan inovasinya bagi kemajuan bangsa dan negara, saat ini dan di masa yang akan mendatang, melalui segmen korporasi maupun segmen konsumer untuk melayani negeri dan masyarakat dari seluruh pelosok hingga mancanegara.

Pada akhir tahun 2023, BNI mempekerjakan lebih dari 27.000 pegawai yang berkompeten. Untuk melayani nasabahnya, BNI memanfaatkan jaringan layanannya yang luas, terdiri dari 2.122 outlet domestik dan 9 cabang luar negeri di Singapura, Hong Kong, Tokyo, New York, London, Seoul, Osaka, Amsterdam, & Sydney. Melalui keberadaan BNI di kota finansial dunia, BNI berkomitmen untuk “menjembatani Indonesia dan Dunia”. BNI senantiasa berupaya menjadi bank pilihan dengan memberikan layanan prima dan solusi bernilai tinggi kepada seluruh nasabahnya.

Selain itu, BNI didukung pula oleh Perusahaan Anak yang memperkuat layanan finansial secara terpadu yaitu antara lain : BNI Multifinance, BNI Sekuritas dan Entitas Anak perusahaannya (BNI Asset Management dan BNI Securities Pte Limited Singapura/BSPL), BNI Life, BNI Remittance, Bank Mayora dan BNI Ventures."

company.name: Kalbe Consumer Health (PT Saka Farma Laboratories)
company.text: kalbe consumer health pt saka farma laboratories
company.description:
"Kalbe Consumer Health Division offers over-the-counter drugs with therapeutic benefits. We produce consumer products with health benefits, including supplements and other preventive products. Kalbe Consumer Health's over-the-counter portfolio categories cover more than six therapeutic classes with solid brands, commanding a dominant market share over recent decades.

Innovation is the key to Kalbe Consumer Health, and we adhere to our commitment to nourish the nation, which we always take care of jointly. We always provide health solutions ranging from digestive and skin categories, multivitamins, respiratory care, food supplements, and healthy foods.

We provide Innovative and Trustworthy products and services as a solution for daily health management. Kalbe Consumer Health is globally present around consumers. We are present in nine countries with more than sixteen OTC brands.

We ensure that all products are developed responsibly to make the lives of many people healthier globally. We believe that in the journey of Kalbe Consumer Health to provide health product solutions that can nourish the nations."
company.address: Gedung C Lantai 3 Jl. Ahmad Yani No. 2, Pulomas, Kec Pulogadung, Jakarta Timur

title: Store Marketing Rodalink
description:
Store Marketing Rodalink

We are looking for dynamic and results-oriented individuals to join our marketing team. The marketing team plays a critical role in growing brand awareness, driving customer acquisition, and enhancing brand loyalty.

company.name: Polygon Group
company.description:
Develop your potential, deliver real impact.

Be a part of Polygon Group big family! Polygon Group is a global bicycle company  with presence in 29 countries and the largest bicycle retail network in Southeast Asia. Be part of our diverse group of engineers and creative thinkers based in North America, Europe, Australia, and Asia. 

Polygon bikes will continue to uphold our value in producing quality bikes and continue to deliver the best riding experience to our riders. We encourage you to involve in this global production process and create your path with us.

We value passion, creativity. We value you.

responsibilities: Develop and execute effective promotional strategies to increase brand awareness within the retail market.
Collaborate with store operations team to ensure all promotional campaigns are aligned with brand goals and executed efficiently
Formulating the brand strategy through the examination of economic indicators, tracking changes in supply and demand, identifying current and future customer needs and ongoing monitoring.
Handling social media activities.
requirements: Bachelor degree communication science, marketing, management or related fields.
Have experience 1-3 years in the same position, fresh graduated are welcome to apply.
Excellent in English both spoken and written.
Basic understanding of content marketing, SEO, and social media trends.
Familiarity with social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc.).
Enthusiastic, creative, and eager to learn.
Good Communication & negotiation skill, creative, analytical, well organized and has strong personality.

Pendidikan S1 Farmasi atau memiliki sertifikat kompetensi di bidang Farmasi
Memiliki pengalaman minimal 2 tahun di bidang produksi industri farmasi menjadi nilai tambah
Memahami kepentingan mesin serta proses produksi, quality management standards, environment, occupational safety & health, dan applicable risk management.
Memahami CPOB
Memiliki jika kepemimpinan yang baik, inovatif, tegas, pemikiran yang kritikal & analitikal, fleksibel, jujur, dan disiplin
Bersedia ditempatkan di GIIC, CIkarang, Jawa Barat

title: Talent Acquisition & Employer Branding
description:
A Talent Acquisition Officer is a professional responsible for sourcing, attracting, and interviewing prospective employees to find the perfect match for a company’s long-term goals. He/ she is also responsible for assisting in the hiring process by providing administrative support, organizing candidate data and assisting with new hire onboarding. 

The Talent Acquisition Officer will work closely with their Supervisor to ensure they have a diverse and qualified pool of individuals. They will be involved in designing and implementing search strategies, such as employer branding initiatives, designed to achieve long-term success in the industry by building a pipeline through innovative processes such as incorporating social media interviews or a video sharing platform on their site.

company.name: Sekolah Cikal
company.description: Sekolah Cikal is an international oriented school that implements Cikal 5 Stars Competencies; consists of national curriculum and International Baccalaureate (IB). Cikal emphasizes individual’s responsibility to the community, be it close community of school, or the wider community of our country Indonesia. School‘s atmosphere, and the way we commit to interact and do the whole learning process are based on the philosophy of Cikal 5 Stars competencies. Currently, we have several sites located in Lebak Bulus, Amri Setu, Kemang, Serpong, Bandung, and Surabaya.
company.address: Jl. Lebak Bulus II No.16A, Kota Jakarta Selatan, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta

responsibilities: Assist in managing the end-to-end recruitment process, from sourcing to onboarding.
Support candidate outreach and communication to build a qualified talent pipeline.
Organize and maintain candidate records and recruitment documentation.
Collaborate on employer branding initiatives to enhance company visibility and appeal.
Coordinate with internal teams to support a positive candidate and new hire experience.
Contribute to the development of innovative hiring strategies aligned with company goals.
requirements: Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources Management, Psychology, or any relevant background.
Solid understanding of the talent acquisition process.
Passionate about employer branding activities.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Strong organizational and time management skills.
Keen attention to detail and accuracy in documentation and data management.
1+ years of experience in talent acquisition or a related field.
Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
Fluent in English, both spoken and written.
Available to join soon

description: GA Admin Staff bertugas mengorganisir dan memastikan kegiatan yang bersifat administratif atau ketatausahaan perusahaan berjalan baik dan lancar. Menjalankan tugas administrasi keuangan dan administrasi kantor termasuk pengurusan ijin terkait operasional kantor, dll serta kegiatan surat menyurat, pengumpulan, pencatatan, pengolahan, penggandaan, pengiriman, penyusunan dan penyimpanan serta memasukkan data, pembukuan, mengatur agenda dan hal-hal lain yang sifatnya teknis demi mendukung pencapaian tujuan organisasi. GA Admin Staff bekerja secara mandiri dengan minimum supervisi, jujur, dan menjalankan tugas-tugasnya berdasarkan standar operating prosedur (SOP) GA yang telah ditetapkan.

title: School Counselor
description: A school counselor provides social, educational, career and personal assistance to non-SSC students. He/she frequently offers advice and career counseling to students about emotional problems, academic challenges, subject options, technical or trade schools, colleges and universities, giving them information on such things as applications, admissions, college entrance exams and financial aid along with teaching job-finding skills. A school counselor is also often involved in peer mediation and conflicts between students. If a student has adjustment issues, the counselor works with school administrators, teachers, social workers, parents and the student to solve the problems.

company.name: Kalbe Consumer Health (PT Saka Farma Laboratories)
company.text: kalbe consumer health pt saka farma laboratories
company.description:
"Kalbe Consumer Health Division offers over-the-counter drugs with therapeutic benefits. We produce consumer products with health benefits, including supplements and other preventive products. Kalbe Consumer Health's over-the-counter portfolio categories cover more than six therapeutic classes with solid brands, commanding a dominant market share over recent decades.

Innovation is the key to Kalbe Consumer Health, and we adhere to our commitment to nourish the nation, which we always take care of jointly. We always provide health solutions ranging from digestive and skin categories, multivitamins, respiratory care, food supplements, and healthy foods.

We provide Innovative and Trustworthy products and services as a solution for daily health management. Kalbe Consumer Health is globally present around consumers. We are present in nine countries with more than sixteen OTC brands.

We ensure that all products are developed responsibly to make the lives of many people healthier globally. We believe that in the journey of Kalbe Consumer Health to provide health product solutions that can nourish the nations."
company.address: Gedung C Lantai 3 Jl. Ahmad Yani No. 2, Pulomas, Kec Pulogadung, Jakarta Timur

title: Designer 2D
description:
UNTUNG BERSAMA SEJAHTERA (UBS), PT is a Manufacturing Jewelry and Gold, since in 1981, CV Untung ("CV" means small-scale business) started its business as a traditional casting gold jewelry producer. The company adopted simple production processes that were far from the touch of modern technology.

In 1991, CV Untung turned into PT Untung Bersama Sejahtera (commonly called PT UBS) and experienced a total renewal in product variety, technology, management and marketing activities. Nevertheless, noble values rooted from the early days were kept. Among the values were keeping reliable purity of gold in the products and putting customers interests and issues above anything else.

Now, this family-run company has entered into the next generation of its leadership and management. Teamed with professionally hired expertise, this second generation is expected to promise the world an enterprise more professional, adaptable and closer to customers. That is, a first choice supplier company for wholesalers and distributors, and a company whose products are most desired by jewelry consumers

company.text: pt untung bersama sejahtera ubs gold
company.description:
UNTUNG BERSAMA SEJAHTERA (UBS), PT is a Manufacturing Jewelry and Gold, since in 1981, CV Untung ("CV" means small-scale business) started its business as a traditional casting gold jewelry producer. The company adopted simple production processes that were far from the touch of modern technology.

That is, a first choice supplier company for wholesalers and distributors, and a company whose products are most desired by jewelry consumers.

Vision:
To Become A Competitive Market Leader In Gold Jewelry Industry with World Class Brand

Mission:
1. By guaranteeing satisfaction of customers and providing them with consistent added values through providing best quality products and vast innovative design variety with the support of modern technology and qualified craftsmen.
2. By guaranteeing success and growth of the corporate business through superior competitiveness, growth of market share, loyal customer base, efficient operation performance and increase of profitability.
3. By prospering staff and employees through human resource development programs, performance appraisals, establishment of different facilities and firm career development programs.

Value:
1. Integrity & Loyalty
2. Unity
3. Creative & Innovative
4. Working Smart
5. Tough

title: E-commerce Specialist

company.name: Simbadda Group
company.description:
Starting an unincorporated business in 1996, Simbadda Group has been distributing high quality consumer electronics throughout Indonesia. The business unit has started to form a corporate business since 2002.

One of our leading brands is SIMBADDA, which is known by the Indonesian people as a pioneer of speakers, cases and power supplies. We are also involved in the distribution of premium gadget accessories and PC components. Simbadda Group will continue to expand its distribution business to grow in the consumer electronics industry in Indonesia.

Simbadda Group always upholds the value of honesty, among others: honesty of quality, honesty of cooperation in business and trying to establish cooperation with all partners throughout Indonesia.

Currently, Simbadda Group is expanding towards digital transformation that is looking for enthusiastic, passionate, ambitious individuals to be part of us.

responsibilities: Responsible for end-to-end process of managing daily operations of marketplace platforms
Monitor daily inventory and manage inventory forecast
Prepare creative brief materials for all marketplaces including but not limited to paid campaigns, monthly promotions, social media contents or/and marketing materials
Maintaining relationships with RM to evaluate store’s current performance, plan for future strategies, informing any updated regulations and be the intermediary between marketplace and the company
Prepare weekly/monthly reports for evaluating store’s performance, quarterly marketing plans or/and other marketplace reports needed to Digital Marketing Manager
Support adhocs of other digital marketing team members
requirements: Bachelor's degree majoring in marketing, advertising, or related majors.
Min 2-3 years experience in handling E-Commerce
Knowledge in Retail & E-Commerce industry
Having deep knowledge in Tiktok shop, shoope and Tokopedia Marketing Campaign
Strong analytical skill, problem solving, and decision making skill
Enjoy working in dynamic environment and ability to maintain relationship across team and externals
Meticulous and time focused in completing the task at hand and accurately

title: Software Analyst, Engineering & Solution Associate
description:
As Senior Software Analyst, Engineering and Solution, you will lead and manage technical project team and be an instrumental cog in the IT PAC (People and Culture) team of GoTo and own everything related to HR system and its ecosystem. Collaborating with other IT Stakeholders, for example Infrastructure, Security, and other Functional teams, you will be responsible for overall technical project planning, development and modification of HR Systems, providing support for Workday with downstream/upstream systems. You will have ample opportunity to flex your Workday configuration skills, and dive deep into projects that deliver exceptional human capital technology solutions, ensuring everything we do works in harmony with GoTo’s goals and values.

Our IT PAC (People and Culture) Team is part of the larger IT Enterprise Systems Team under the CIO Organization. This larger team, which has more than 50 team members globally, oversees all internal and enterprise systems for GoTo's businesses, including (but not limited to) finance, people services, productivity, sales, operations, internal security access, authentication, account authorization, account audits, and emails. For instance, should you have a question about how to do automation or how to authenticate your work email  with a particular app/service, We are your people!

We are a tight-knit group made up of folks who love to play soccer, tennis, cook, enjoy reading great books, and getting together to just hang out over coffees or iced-teas.  We work hard and play hard, and believe it or not, we actually enjoy each other’s company!

title: People Operations Specialist

We want to be co-creators in shaping the right workplace, culture and leaders for the future of GoTo and help shape the direction of what we believe is the right way in treating our people.

title: Media Intelligence Intern
description:
As a media intelligence intern, you’ll monitor conventional and social media channels for brand mentions. You'll gather data, analyze sentiment, track trends, and assess the intensity of media coverage. By compiling concise, actionable reports, you empower the corporate affairs team to swiftly address emerging issues and adjust communication strategies. Your keen analysis and attention to detail are vital in shaping our brand's public perception and supporting effective stakeholder engagement.

Corporate Affairs team is a blend of thoughtful inquiry and dynamic action, where each day invites reflection on the narratives shaping our world. We embrace the complexity of media with curiosity and integrity, transforming raw data into insights that guide meaningful decisions. Here, every conversation and report is a stepping stone towards deeper understanding, echoing our shared belief in continuous growth and mindful communication. We foster an environment where creativity, diverse perspectives, and collaborative problem-solving converge, creating a space where the art of observation meets the science of strategy. Join us in this journey of exploration and transformation.

title: Estimator
description:
·         Menyusun perhitungan estimasi biaya proyek, termasuk material, tenaga kerja, dan alat.

·         Membuat Rencana Anggaran Biaya (RAB) berdasarkan gambar kerja dan spesifikasi teknis.

·         Menganalisis dan mengevaluasi harga pasar untuk memastikan biaya yang kompetitif dan realistis.

·         Menyusun dan mengajukan proposal harga ke klien berdasarkan estimasi biaya yang telah dihitung.

·         Melakukan evaluasi perbandingan harga antar vendor dan supplier untuk mendapatkan harga terbaik.

·         Berkolaborasi dengan tim purchasing untuk memastikan harga material sesuai dengan estimasi biaya.

·         Melakukan koordinasi dengan tim desain dan proyek untuk memastikan perhitungan sesuai dengan kebutuhan lapangan.

·         Melakukan analisis risiko biaya proyek, termasuk potensi kenaikan harga atau perubahan spesifikasi material.

·         Menyusun laporan estimasi proyek sebagai referensi dalam pengambilan keputusan manajemen.

·         Melakukan revisi estimasi biaya jika ada perubahan dalam spesifikasi atau kondisi proyek di lapangan.

title: Business Analyst
description:
As a Functional Consultant, your main responsibility is to implement Odoo software. You will work directly with clients to analyze their needs, provide training, and deliver Odoo solutions (configurations) that match their business requirements. Our Functional Consultant will also support the development of our partner network (implementation partners) from various countries through coaching aimed at preparing them to become Odoo experts capable of implementing customer solutions according to established standards.

You will have the opportunity to collaborate directly with Medium Market & Corporate companies, with larger-scale projects and long-term business engagements. The objective of the Functional Consultant in such situations remains to implement, provide training, and deliver solutions that meet professional standards.

A variety of different projects will become part of your portfolio as an Odoo's Functional Consultant. Be prepared for hands-on experience starting from your first week with us!

company.name: PT Odoo Software Indonesia
company.description:
Odoo is an open-source suite of integrated business applications actively programmed, supported, and organized by Odoo SA. Odoo is similar to many open-source projects where customized programming, support, and other services are provided by an active global community and partners network. The community is comprised of more than 1,500 active members and has contributed more than 4,500 modules to the ongoing enrichment of Odoo. The network of certified partners, established in more than 120 countries, deploys the solution locally. The software, with more than 1,500 downloads a day, is one of the most frequently installed business suites worldwide.

All Odoo Apps such as Odoo CRM, Odoo Sales, Odoo Accounting, Odoo WMS (Warehouse Management), Odoo HR, Odoo Project, Odoo Events, Odoo Marketing, etc. are integrated with each other.
company.address: Biomedical Campus, Knowledge Tower Lt.6, Kavling Digital Hub, Jalan Damai Foresta, Sampora, Cisauk

responsibilities: mplement Odoo software: provide appropriate training and functional support for customers
Analyze customer needs and suggest suitable solutions before entering the implementation phase (configuration & development)
Project management: planning, forecasting, documenting, monitoring, and implementing Odoo software, followed by further action follow-ups
Collaborate with Odoo developers to meet more specific implementation needs and with the Odoo Sales team regarding pre- and post-sales
Support the development of our partner network to become Odoo Experts

title: B2B Sales
description:
Join our Business Advisor team and showcase your skills in analyzing, advising, and negotiating to help new customers onboard and utilize Odoo software. As a Business Advisor, you will engage with various SMEs and MNCs from diverse industries to provide in-depth consultations, advice, and tailored solutions for their businesses. You will collaborate with business owners, operators, and C-level executives from different companies every day. Additionally, you'll get the chance to learn firsthand how companies across various industries operate. At Odoo, the Business Advisor role offers unparalleled learning opportunities.

Your daily operations will be conducted at our new, modern office in BSD.

title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
Join one of the fastest growing IT software companies in our Indonesia office. Challenge yourself and combine implementation & technical projects with customer relationship.

As a Software Developer (Full Stack), you will be responsible for developing a customized solution. Specifically, you will be dealing with clients who are not satisfied with the Odoo product as it is presented and wish to implement specific elements for a customized use of it. The team provides the development from technical analysis to support. Customer relations are generally handled by our Functional Consultants. Your daily tasks will be undertaken from our office in Indonesia.

title: Multimedia Designer
description:
As a Multimedia Designer at Odoo Indonesia, you will produce high-quality videos, graphics, basic motion, and other visual content that align with our brand. You will be involved in the full creative process from ideation and conceptualization to production and delivery—creating content that enhances our product marketing efforts across various channels. Additionally, you will collaborate with different departments and contribute to other creative projects, such as photo retouching and graphic design, helping to bring Odoo's visual identity to life.

Your main focus will be on video production and editing, but you will also have the chance to work on multimedia design projects to create a broad range of digital content.

description: Mechanical Design Engineer, you are responsible for testing package qualifications, releases, quality, stability improvements, and leading productivity/quality improvement projects in testing.

company.name: Polygon Group
company.description:
Develop your potential, deliver real impact.

Be a part of Polygon Group big family! Polygon Group is a global bicycle company  with presence in 29 countries and the largest bicycle retail network in Southeast Asia. Be part of our diverse group of engineers and creative thinkers based in North America, Europe, Australia, and Asia. 

Polygon bikes will continue to uphold our value in producing quality bikes and continue to deliver the best riding experience to our riders. We encourage you to involve in this global production process and create your path with us.

We value passion, creativity. We value you.

responsibilities: Minimum bachelor degree from material and metallurgical engineering/mechanical/mechatronics engineer

Have good engineering mindset.
Attentive to detail.
Energetic, creative, and innovative.
Passionate in sports, especially cycling is a plus point.
requirements: Designing bicycle (frame, fork, and part) and formulating product specifications.

Work together with cross sections related to the design implementation process and product design.
Analyze and review the results of the Bike Prototype in order to ensure the compatibility of the product sample has been follow the project brief and safety standards.

title: General Banking Staff (GBS)
description:
General Banking Staff (GBS) adalah jalur rekrutmen dengan level staf yang didedikasikan untuk mendukung berbagai area kerja yang berperan penting dalam memastikan kelancaran dan efektivitas proses bisnis perusahaan. Kandidat yang terpilih untuk posisi ini akan menjadi bagian penting dalam menjaga keunggulan operasional dan bisnis, serta diharapkan menunjukkan kemampuan beradaptasi dan motivasi untuk berprestasi atau menjadi unggul di berbagai fungsi.

General Banking Staff (GBS) dirancang untuk mengembangkan tenaga kerja yang terampil dengan fokus pada area utama seperti pendanaan, perkreditan, dan manajemen operasional. Peserta akan menerima pelatihan dan pendidikan intensif yang dirancang untuk membangun pemahaman mendalam di bidang-bidang kunci tersebut. 

Program ini juga menyediakan peluang pengembangan profesional berkelanjutan, memungkinkan para peserta untuk terus meningkatkan kemampuan mereka dari waktu ke waktu.  khususnya pada aspek pendanaan dan perkreditan

Dengan mengembangkan talenta ini, kami bertujuan untuk memberdayakan peserta agar dapat memberikan kontribusi signifikan terhadap sasaran utama bisnis dan menjaga kerangka operasional yang kuat dan tangguh di seluruh organisasi.

Bergabunglah bersama kami dan jadilah bagian dari BTNers yang akan membangun masa depan yang lebih baik!

title: Quality Assurance Intern
description: As a Quality Assurance (QA) Intern, you will assist in testing, documenting issues, and improving the overall quality of products. You will be involved in various aspects of manual and automated testing processes and work with cross-functional teams to ensure product quality.
responsibilities: Assist in the development and execution of manual and automated (if any) test cases.
Collaborate with QA team members to identify, document, and track bugs.
Collaborate with project managers, developers, and stakeholders to define quality standards.
Record problems and issues
Create logs to document testing phases and defects
Report bugs and errors to development teams
Participate in project development meetings and contribute to quality discussions.
Support regression, performance, and functional testing.
Maintain and update QA documentation, including test plans and reports.
Act as an AI Trainer by curating and labeling data to improve AI model performance.
Analyze AI outputs and provide feedback to enhance system accuracy.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure product quality aligns with customer expectations.
requirements: Final year students, fresh graduates from any related fields, or young professionals with a maximum of 2 years of work experience with strong skills in Quality Assurance.
Strong interest in Quality Assurance and AI technologies.
Familiarity with Agile frameworks (Scrum, XP, Kanban) and regression testing is a plus.
Ability to create UAT test plans, test cases and test scripts.
Working knowledge of test software (e.g. Postman, Katalon, Selenium, JMeter, Burp).
Excellent communication skills.
Problem-solving aptitude with adeptness in anticipation abilities.
Having an understanding of LLM (Large Language Model) is a plus.

title: Web Developer Intern
description: As a Web Developer Intern, you will assist the team in various aspects of web development and application management, contributing to both the development and testing of systems.
responsibilities: Assisting to translate user requirements into the overall architecture and implementation of the new systems.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers, software engineers, and researchers to solve applications design problems as they arise.
Understand, create and debug database related queries.
Assisting to create test code to validate the application against client requirements.
Monitor the performance of web applications & infrastructure.
Troubleshooting web applications with a fast and accurate resolution.
requirements: Final year students, fresh graduates from any related fields, or young professionals with a maximum of 2 years of work experience.
Commands expertise in at least one web framework, such as Laravel, Django, Ruby on Rails, Express, or similar.
Possesses extensive experience in WordPress development.
Demonstrates proficiency in PHP, HTML, CSS, and Javascript.
Eager to learn new programming language and/or new technology.
Have a solid understanding of Algorithms and Data Structure.
Highly interested in and understanding the development of the technology industry.
Currently not attached to other employment programs.
Willing to commit to the program for 6 months.

title: Technical Writer
description: As a Technical Writer, you will be responsible for creating clear, concise, and accurate documentation for our products and services.
responsibilities: Work with internal teams to obtain an in-depth understanding of products and documentation requirements.
Obtain a deep understanding of products and services to translate complex product information into simple, polished, and engaging content.
Develop comprehensive documentations that meet organizational standards, with a consistent and cohesive voice across all documentation.
Develop and maintain detailed databases of appropriate reference materials, including research, usability tests, and design specifications.
Evaluate current documentation and develop innovative approaches for improvement.
requirements: Proven experience in technical writing of product documentation.
Good understanding of information technology & tech product development.
Ability to quickly grasp complex technical concepts and make them easily understandable.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail.
Proficient in English (specifically written).

Perusahaan ini telah berkembang selama 18 tahun, memiliki 130 jaringan di seluruh Indonesia dan memiliki lebih dari 3.000 karyawan. title: Product Manager
description: As a Product Manager, you will be responsible for driving the product strategy and ensuring the creation of innovative and market-fitting products.
responsibilities: Gain a deep understanding of customer experience while identifying and filling product gaps.
Generate new ideas that can elevate growth and customer experience to the next level.
Convert product strategy into detailed requirements and prototypes.
Scope and prioritize activities based on business and customer impact.
Work closely with engineering teams to deliver products in high demand with a good market fit.
Drive product launches by collaborating with the Marketing team, executives, and other Product Management team members.
Act as a product evangelist to build awareness and understanding.
Represent the company to solicit feedback regarding the product.
requirements: Ability to develop product management strategies and effectively communicate recommendations to executive management.
Solid technical background with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development and web technologies.
Strong analytical mind and problem solving skills with effective communication abilities.
Skilled at working effectively with cross functional teams in a matrix organization.
Fluent in both Bahasa Indonesia and English (written and spoken).

title: Junior Project Manager
description: As a Project Manager in the tech or SaaS industry, you will lead the entire project management lifecycle, ensuring projects are delivered on time, within scope, and on budget.
responsibilities: Lead end-to-end project management, ensuring timely delivery within scope and budget.
Coordinate with internal teams and external vendors for seamless project execution.
Define clear project scopes, objectives, and deliverables, ensuring technical feasibility.
Develop detailed project plans, allocate resources efficiently, and monitor progress.
Identify potential risks, propose mitigation strategies, and adapt to project changes.
Maintain strong relationships with stakeholders, providing regular updates and reports.
Continuously evaluate project outcomes and recommend process improvements.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or a related field.

title: Information Security Manager
description: As the Data Protection Officer (DPO) at Qiscus, you will play a pivotal role in safeguarding the company’s data and security operations. You will be the primary point of contact for external security-related concerns, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations.
responsibilities: Act as Qiscus' Data Protection Officer (DPO) and main contact for external security concerns.
Design and implement security strategies and ensure compliance through audits.
Manage the SOC manpower, including hiring and training SOC team members.
Define and review key security performance indicators to ensure proper service delivery and improvements.
Provide leadership, guidance, and technical expertise to internal teams, collaborating with relevant departments.
Ensure that security incident detection, responses, and recovery procedures are up-to-date and compliant with current security laws and regulations.
Manage SOC financials, including budgeting, spending reviews, and proposing cost-efficient security solutions.
Prepare and present security reports to stakeholders, including regulators and clients.
requirements: A minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree from Information Technology or relevant disciplines.
A minimum of 3 years experience as a SOC Manager, SOC team leader or information security leader, preferably with a B2B SaaS background.
Experienced in IT Security internal and external audits.
Possesses strong knowledge of at least 2 of the following security frameworks : ISO 27001:2022, SOC2, NIST, GDPR, PDPA, or PCI-DSS.
Possesses strong knowledge and hands-on experience on SIEM, IT governance, technical security (Red Team) and applicable laws and regulations related to information security.
Familiar with Metasploit, Mandiant, BloodHound, SQLMaps and/or similar tools.
Familiar with cloud servers, enterprise infrastructure and SaaS applications.
Has abilities associated with leadership, strategic and critical thinking, and is able to pay attention to details.
Willing to be based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia.

company.name: PT. BFI FINANCE INDONESIA Tbk
company.text: acesfa 40 - pt. bfi finance indonesia tbk
company.description:
PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk berdiri pada tahun 1982 sebagai PT Manufacturer Hanover Leasing Indonesia, sebuah perusahaan patungan antara Manufacturer Hanover Leasing Corporation dari Amerika Serikat dengan pemegang saham lokal. BFI adalah perusahaan pembiayaan terlama di Indonesia sekaligus menjadi perusahaan pembiayaan pertama yang mencatatkan sahamnya di Bursa Efek Jakarta dan Bursa Efek Surabaya (sekarang disebut Bursa Efek Indonesia atau BEI). Perusahaan melakukan go public pada Mei 1990 dengan kode saham BFIN. Setelah menjalankan proses restrukturisasi utang yang bersumber dari krisis keuangan 1998, Perusahaan secara resmi berganti nama menjadi PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk pada 2001. Saat ini 42,8% saham BFI dimiliki oleh konsorsium Trinugraha Capital SA (yang antara lain terdiri dari TPG dan Northstar Group). Sisanya dimiliki oleh pemegang saham institusi lokal dan internasional, serta pemegang saham publik.

PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk. (BFI Finance) berfokus pada pembiayaan dengan beragam tujuan seperti modal kerja, multiguna dan investasi, dengan jaminan berupa kendaraan bermotor roda empat dan roda dua, alat berat dan mesin, property, serta sebagainya. Saat ini, BFI Finance telah tumbuh menjadi salah satu perusahaan pembiayaan terbesar di Indonesia dengan jaringan dan cakupan produk terluas yang didukung lebih dari 8.000 karyawan di lebih dari 300 outlet di seluruh wilayah Indonesia, dengan 45 diantaranya memiliki layanan pembiayaan syariah.
company.address: BFI Tower Sunburst CBD Lot. 1.2 Jl. Kapt. Soebijanto Djojohadikusumo BSD City - Tangerang Selatan 15322

Melakukan proses survey pengajuan pinjaman dari setiap konsumen untuk memastikan kesesuaian data dan mengawasi prosesnya hingga pencairan dana dilakukan

title: Key Account Manager
description: We are looking for an experienced Key Account Manager to build and maintain long-term relationships with strategic clients. You will be responsible for understanding client needs, optimizing the use of Qiscus solutions, and creating new opportunities for business growth. This position also includes proposal creation, presentation of appropriate solutions, and achievement of sales targets. Minimum 2 years of experience in key account management or related roles is required, with strong communication and negotiation skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English.
responsibilities: Understand clients needs deeply by engaging the various stakeholders in their organization, including the management.
Help clients optimize the usage of Qiscus solutions so that they are able to maximize their ROI.
Identify new areas where we can better help our clients grow their business using other Qiscus solutions.
Create proposals and pitch the best solution(s) that address(es) clients needs.
Maintain close relationships with existing clients and ensure high customer satisfaction ratings.
Achieve sales targets and profitability objectives.
Proactively assesses, clarifies, and validates client needs on an ongoing basis.
requirements: Entrepreneurial in mindset and spirit.
Comfortable in engaging different levels of stakeholders, including C-Levels.
Has an outgoing personality with strong presentation and negotiation skills, be it online or offline.
At least 2 years in Key Account Management role or relevant roles such as Business Development.
Experienced in IT System Integrator, Consulting, Principal is a bonus.
Experienced in delivering client focused solutions based on customer needs.
Highly proactive and forthcoming in contributing ideas and suggestions to the management.
Ability to manage and coordinate between different entities/contact points, and doing so remotely/physically where necessary.
Fluent in both Bahasa Indonesia and English (written and spoken).

title: Enterprise Sales
description: We are looking for an experienced Enterprise Sales to drive sales growth and develop strategic partnerships. You will be responsible for achieving sales targets, building relationships with clients and partners, and supporting the implementation of software solutions. Minimum 3 years of experience in SaaS, IT System Integrator, or IT Consulting is required, with strong communication, negotiation, and presentation skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English.
responsibilities: Achieve sales targets and profitability objectives.
Maintain good rapport and expand opportunities with existing clients and partners.
Identify relevant client needs, priorities initiatives, and execute a clear plan of action for success.
Follow through the pre- and post-sales activities.
Build new relationships with partners (software agencies etc).
Conduct partner briefing sessions and prepare sales materials for partners.
requirements: Entrepreneurial in mindset and spirit.
Have at least 3 years working experience as BD Manager in a SaaS company, IT System Integrator, or similar field.
Have sufficient technical understanding regarding software implementation as well as basic technical knowledge that helps to appreciate the technical aspects of real-time communication technologies.
Experience in IT System Integrator, Consulting, Principal is a good plus.
Highly proactive and forthcoming in contributing ideas and suggestions to the management.
Ability to manage and coordinate between different entities/contact points while doing so remotely/physically where necessary.

description: This position is responsible for thoroughly understanding potential client's needs and providing appropriate technical solutions to support their success. company.name: PT. BFI FINANCE INDONESIA Tbk
company.text: acesfa 40 - pt. bfi finance indonesia tbk
company.description:
PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk berdiri pada tahun 1982 sebagai PT Manufacturer Hanover Leasing Indonesia, sebuah perusahaan patungan antara Manufacturer Hanover Leasing Corporation dari Amerika Serikat dengan pemegang saham lokal. BFI adalah perusahaan pembiayaan terlama di Indonesia sekaligus menjadi perusahaan pembiayaan pertama yang mencatatkan sahamnya di Bursa Efek Jakarta dan Bursa Efek Surabaya (sekarang disebut Bursa Efek Indonesia atau BEI). Perusahaan melakukan go public pada Mei 1990 dengan kode saham BFIN. Setelah menjalankan proses restrukturisasi utang yang bersumber dari krisis keuangan 1998, Perusahaan secara resmi berganti nama menjadi PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk pada 2001. Saat ini 42,8% saham BFI dimiliki oleh konsorsium Trinugraha Capital SA (yang antara lain terdiri dari TPG dan Northstar Group). Sisanya dimiliki oleh pemegang saham institusi lokal dan internasional, serta pemegang saham publik.

PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk. (BFI Finance) berfokus pada pembiayaan dengan beragam tujuan seperti modal kerja, multiguna dan investasi, dengan jaminan berupa kendaraan bermotor roda empat dan roda dua, alat berat dan mesin, property, serta sebagainya. Saat ini, BFI Finance telah tumbuh menjadi salah satu perusahaan pembiayaan terbesar di Indonesia dengan jaringan dan cakupan produk terluas yang didukung lebih dari 8.000 karyawan di lebih dari 300 outlet di seluruh wilayah Indonesia, dengan 45 diantaranya memiliki layanan pembiayaan syariah.
company.address: BFI Tower Sunburst CBD Lot. 1.2 Jl. Kapt. Soebijanto Djojohadikusumo BSD City - Tangerang Selatan 15322

Mengumpulkan bukti dan menyusun kronologi kejadian guna mengidentifikasi pihak yang terlibat serta merekomendasikan sanksi atas penyimpangan.
Mempertanggungjawabkan temuan audit secara independen dan profesional

title: Asisten Apoteker
description:

Tugas dan Taggung Jawab:

  1. Melakukan permintaan obat dan alat kesehatan, melalui indent ke Mainstore Pharmacy (Gudang Farmasi) sesuai dengan SPO yang berlaku.

  2. Melakukan serah terima obat dan alat kesehatan sesuai indent issue dari Gudang Farmasi, dengan memperhatikan kesesuaian fisik, jumlah, keutuhan kemasan, kadaluwarsa; kemudian melakukan indent receipt.

  3. Melakukan penyimpanan obat dan alat kesehatan.

  4. Melakukan pencatatan setiap memasukkan dan mengeluarkan barang dari kotak.rak obat di kartu stok

  5. Melakukan distribusi obat dan alat kesehatan.

  6. Melakukan pelayanan resep dari dokter, meliputi penyiapan obat, peracikan, penimbangan, pengemasan, pembuatan etiket, pengecekan, serta penyerahan obat kepada Apoteker

  1. Pendidikan terakhir D3 Farmasi

  2. Memiliki STRTTK yang aktif

  3. Pengalaman min 1 tahun sebagai Asisten Apoteker di Rumah Sakit

  4. Bersedia bekerja dalam sistem shift

Set up as a Representative Office in 1994, it was subsequently established as Sysmex Singapore Pte Ltd in 1998 and eventually became known as Sysmex Asia Pacific Pte Ltd in October 2005. Located at the centre of regional market operations, Singapore is Sysmex’s headquarters in the Asia Pacific region.

In Asia Pacific, Sysmex is a market leader in the delivery and implementation of clinical IVD and health IT products and services for clinical laboratories, hospitals and healthcare organisations. Its products and solutions continuously help improve patient clinical services and efficiency advances resulting in cost savings, which in turn translate to the delivery of better patient care.
Globally, Sysmex delivers total solutions in the field of clinical laboratory testing, including haematology, haemostasis, urinalysis, clinical chemistry, immunoassay system, flow cytometry and life science. Supplying products and services to customers in more than 190 countries, Sysmex is one of the market leaders in haematology and coagulation instrumentation worldwide.

company.name: PT. ANUGERAH TOTAL SOLUSI (SUTINDO)
company.description:
Sutindo Group mengawali perjalanan karirnya melalui sebuah bangunan toko kecil di daerah Pegirian, Surabaya, Jawa Timur. Didirikan oleh (Alm) Bp. Nanang Sutiono pada tahun 1970an. Dengan seiring berkembangnya waktu dan kerja keras yang terus menerus dilakukan, Sutindo Group telah berkembang menjadi perusahaan grup yang beragam dengan lebih dari 1700 karyawan yang tersebar di seluruh Indonesia. Tidak hanya itu, Sutindo Group juga mengembangkan bidang usahanya di berbagai divisi diantaranya carbon steel, non-ferrous, stainless steel, material bangunan, project, dan bahan kimia.
Sutindo Group menerapkan sistem yang dikenal sebagai Sutindo Management System, yang di implentasikan dari total management quality. Sistem ini diterapkan dalam pekerjaan dengan tujuan bisa merangkul semua individu dalam setiap level jabatan untuk mengelola dan mengembangkan individu tersebut hingga akhirnya dapat mencapai kepuasan pelanggan internal dan eksternal.
Dengan komitmen dan tekad yang kuat, di tengah krisis ekonomi dan tantangan yang ada, Sutindo Group hadir di berbagai wilayah
di Indonesia untuk terus menyediakan produk dan memberikan layanan terbaik serta membuka kesempatan bagi semua orang
untuk bergabung menjadi bagian di Sutindo Group. Berfokus pada BAS Group, GCI Group, dan SRM Group. Divisi kami terdiri dari Sales & Marketing, Purchasing, Finance & Accounting, Human Resource, Warehouse, Quality Management Representetive, Information Technology, Product Design & Development, serta Research and Development.

title: Admin Accounting
description: Perusahaan yang berdiri sejak 1953, merupakan salah satu perusahaan tekstil ternama dan berpengalaman di Indonesia. Tak hanya itu, BEHAESTEX juga dikenal sebagai salah satu produsen busana muslim terbesar di dunia, khususnya pada kategori produk sarung tenun berkualitas. BEHAESTEX memiliki keunggulan dan keunikan tersendiri, yakni sebagai produsen yang melestarikan dan mengembangkan alat tenun tradisional budaya khas Indonesia yang dikenal sebagai ATBM (Alat Tenun Bukan Mesin). Produk sarung dan kain yang dihasilkan dari ATBM tersebut merupakan produk pekerjaan tangan atau handicrafts. Hal ini menjadikan BEHAESTEX berpredikat sebagai produsen sarung dan kain ATBM terbaik dan terbesar di dunia. BEHAESTEX sebagai produsen tekstil yang populer dengan merk BHS dan ATLAS telah mendistribusikan produk-produknya ke seluruh Indonesia dan berbagai negara di ASEAN, Timur Tengah, Afrika, dan belahan dunia lainnya.

company.name: PT BEHAESTEX
company.description:
Perusahaan yang berdiri sejak 1953, merupakan salah satu perusahaan tekstil ternama dan berpengalaman di Indonesia. Tak hanya itu, BEHAESTEX juga dikenal sebagai salah satu produsen busana muslim terbesar di dunia, khususnya pada kategori produk sarung tenun berkualitas.

BEHAESTEX memiliki keunggulan dan keunikan tersendiri, yakni sebagai produsen yang melestarikan dan mengembangkan alat tenun tradisional budaya khas Indonesia yang dikenal sebagai ATBM (Alat Tenun Bukan Mesin). Produk sarung dan kain yang dihasilkan dari ATBM tersebut merupakan produk pekerjaan tangan atau handicrafts. Hal ini menjadikan BEHAESTEX berpredikat sebagai produsen sarung dan kain ATBM terbaik dan terbesar di dunia.

BEHAESTEX sebagai produsen tekstil yang populer dengan merk BHS dan ATLAS telah mendistribusikan produk-produknya ke seluruh Indonesia dan berbagai negara di ASEAN, Timur Tengah, Afrika, dan belahan dunia lainnya.

BHS
Sarung BHS merupakan warisan hasanah budaya nusantara yang dihasilkan dari helai benang berkualitas. Ditenun oleh tangan terampil yang berpengalaman puluhan tahun yang menghasilkan karya seni bernilai tinggi. Menghadirkan keragaman dan keunikan motif dari perpaduan corak dan warna, sehingga tercipta karya budaya yang membanggakan. Hal inilah yang membuat Sarung BHS menjadi salah satu ikon budaya bangsa Indonesia.

ATLAS
Sarung Atlas dihasilkan melalui proses teknologi mutakhir. Dirancang oleh tenaga ahli profesional di bidangnya. Perpaduan seni dan teknologi menjadikan produk-produk yang dihasilkan berkualitas terbaik. Keragaman varian serta keindahan motif dan warna tersusun anggun dalam setiap produk yang dihasilkan.

company.name: PT. ANUGERAH TOTAL SOLUSI (SUTINDO)
company.description:
Sutindo Group mengawali perjalanan karirnya melalui sebuah bangunan toko kecil di daerah Pegirian, Surabaya, Jawa Timur. Didirikan oleh (Alm) Bp. Nanang Sutiono pada tahun 1970an. Dengan seiring berkembangnya waktu dan kerja keras yang terus menerus dilakukan, Sutindo Group telah berkembang menjadi perusahaan grup yang beragam dengan lebih dari 1700 karyawan yang tersebar di seluruh Indonesia. Tidak hanya itu, Sutindo Group juga mengembangkan bidang usahanya di berbagai divisi diantaranya carbon steel, non-ferrous, stainless steel, material bangunan, project, dan bahan kimia.
Sutindo Group menerapkan sistem yang dikenal sebagai Sutindo Management System, yang di implentasikan dari total management quality. Sistem ini diterapkan dalam pekerjaan dengan tujuan bisa merangkul semua individu dalam setiap level jabatan untuk mengelola dan mengembangkan individu tersebut hingga akhirnya dapat mencapai kepuasan pelanggan internal dan eksternal.
Dengan komitmen dan tekad yang kuat, di tengah krisis ekonomi dan tantangan yang ada, Sutindo Group hadir di berbagai wilayah
di Indonesia untuk terus menyediakan produk dan memberikan layanan terbaik serta membuka kesempatan bagi semua orang
untuk bergabung menjadi bagian di Sutindo Group. Berfokus pada BAS Group, GCI Group, dan SRM Group. Divisi kami terdiri dari Sales & Marketing, Purchasing, Finance & Accounting, Human Resource, Warehouse, Quality Management Representetive, Information Technology, Product Design & Development, serta Research and Development.

Through our strong M&S divisions, Daewoong has the largest prescription drug sales in the South Korean market. Presently, we commercialize 10 blockbuster products. PT Dharma Lautan Utama adalah sebuah perusahaan yang melayani transportasi laut dan penyeberangan feri di seluruh Indonesia. - Memberikan nilai tambah maksimal
- Mempunyai daya saing bisnis tinggi

- Misi Sosial (Memberikan jasa pelayanan penyeberangan atau pelayaran antar pulau dengan biaya terjangkau oleh masyarakat luas) 
- Misi Ekonomi (Memberikan kontribusi atau sumbangan bagi pertumbuhan ekonomi nasional dan regional, Memberikan nilai tambah yang maksimal bagi pemakai jasa penyeberangan atau pelayaran)

title: IT Specialist

company.name: PT Sysmex Indonesia
company.description:
Sysmex Asia Pacific Pte Ltd is a subsidiary of Sysmex Corporation of Japan. Set up as a Representative Office in 1994, it was subsequently established as Sysmex Singapore Pte Ltd in 1998 and eventually became known as Sysmex Asia Pacific Pte Ltd in October 2005. Located at the centre of regional market operations, Singapore is Sysmex’s headquarters in the Asia Pacific region.

In Asia Pacific, Sysmex is a market leader in the delivery and implementation of clinical IVD and health IT products and services for clinical laboratories, hospitals and healthcare organisations. Its products and solutions continuously help improve patient clinical services and efficiency advances resulting in cost savings, which in turn translate to the delivery of better patient care.
Globally, Sysmex delivers total solutions in the field of clinical laboratory testing, including haematology, haemostasis, urinalysis, clinical chemistry, immunoassay system, flow cytometry and life science. Supplying products and services to customers in more than 190 countries, Sysmex is one of the market leaders in haematology and coagulation instrumentation worldwide.

title: Sales Executive

company.name: PT Sysmex Indonesia
company.description:
Sysmex Asia Pacific Pte Ltd is a subsidiary of Sysmex Corporation of Japan. Set up as a Representative Office in 1994, it was subsequently established as Sysmex Singapore Pte Ltd in 1998 and eventually became known as Sysmex Asia Pacific Pte Ltd in October 2005. Located at the centre of regional market operations, Singapore is Sysmex’s headquarters in the Asia Pacific region.

In Asia Pacific, Sysmex is a market leader in the delivery and implementation of clinical IVD and health IT products and services for clinical laboratories, hospitals and healthcare organisations. Its products and solutions continuously help improve patient clinical services and efficiency advances resulting in cost savings, which in turn translate to the delivery of better patient care.
Globally, Sysmex delivers total solutions in the field of clinical laboratory testing, including haematology, haemostasis, urinalysis, clinical chemistry, immunoassay system, flow cytometry and life science. Supplying products and services to customers in more than 190 countries, Sysmex is one of the market leaders in haematology and coagulation instrumentation worldwide.

Mature resourceful, self-motivated and result oriented
Ability to identify problems, strong conceptual and analytical thinking and support with outstanding communication skills
Having work experience in diagnostics or healthcare field will be an advantage

Now very well known company in steel fabrication construction, material handling equipment and to support excellent products and punctual delivery times. We have experience for over 37 years in domestic and overseas mining projects. To compete with other similiar companies, we have built a strong commitment towards to the customer’s requirements by following International Standard related to the nature of business. In 2025, Quality Management (ISO 9001:2015) and Health & Safety Management (ISO 45001:2018) were implemented to achieve this commitment.
company.address: Bekasi International Industrial Estate, Lippo Cikarang, Jl. Inti II No.12

drill plate

title: Brand Development Head
description: Perusahaan yang berdiri sejak 1953, merupakan salah satu perusahaan tekstil ternama dan berpengalaman di Indonesia. Tak hanya itu, BEHAESTEX juga dikenal sebagai salah satu produsen busana muslim terbesar di dunia, khususnya pada kategori produk sarung tenun berkualitas. BEHAESTEX memiliki keunggulan dan keunikan tersendiri, yakni sebagai produsen yang melestarikan dan mengembangkan alat tenun tradisional budaya khas Indonesia yang dikenal sebagai ATBM (Alat Tenun Bukan Mesin). Produk sarung dan kain yang dihasilkan dari ATBM tersebut merupakan produk pekerjaan tangan atau handicrafts. Hal ini menjadikan BEHAESTEX berpredikat sebagai produsen sarung dan kain ATBM terbaik dan terbesar di dunia. BEHAESTEX sebagai produsen tekstil yang populer dengan merk BHS dan ATLAS telah mendistribusikan produk-produknya ke seluruh Indonesia dan berbagai negara di ASEAN, Timur Tengah, Afrika, dan belahan dunia lainnya.

company.name: PT BEHAESTEX
company.description:
Perusahaan yang berdiri sejak 1953, merupakan salah satu perusahaan tekstil ternama dan berpengalaman di Indonesia. Tak hanya itu, BEHAESTEX juga dikenal sebagai salah satu produsen busana muslim terbesar di dunia, khususnya pada kategori produk sarung tenun berkualitas.

BEHAESTEX memiliki keunggulan dan keunikan tersendiri, yakni sebagai produsen yang melestarikan dan mengembangkan alat tenun tradisional budaya khas Indonesia yang dikenal sebagai ATBM (Alat Tenun Bukan Mesin). Produk sarung dan kain yang dihasilkan dari ATBM tersebut merupakan produk pekerjaan tangan atau handicrafts. Hal ini menjadikan BEHAESTEX berpredikat sebagai produsen sarung dan kain ATBM terbaik dan terbesar di dunia.

BEHAESTEX sebagai produsen tekstil yang populer dengan merk BHS dan ATLAS telah mendistribusikan produk-produknya ke seluruh Indonesia dan berbagai negara di ASEAN, Timur Tengah, Afrika, dan belahan dunia lainnya.

BHS
Sarung BHS merupakan warisan hasanah budaya nusantara yang dihasilkan dari helai benang berkualitas. Ditenun oleh tangan terampil yang berpengalaman puluhan tahun yang menghasilkan karya seni bernilai tinggi. Menghadirkan keragaman dan keunikan motif dari perpaduan corak dan warna, sehingga tercipta karya budaya yang membanggakan. Hal inilah yang membuat Sarung BHS menjadi salah satu ikon budaya bangsa Indonesia.

ATLAS
Sarung Atlas dihasilkan melalui proses teknologi mutakhir. Dirancang oleh tenaga ahli profesional di bidangnya. Perpaduan seni dan teknologi menjadikan produk-produk yang dihasilkan berkualitas terbaik. Keragaman varian serta keindahan motif dan warna tersusun anggun dalam setiap produk yang dihasilkan.

Memiliki pengalaman untuk membuat thematic campaign dan realisasinya
Mampu mencari vendor untuk keperluan material promo dan aktifitas promo
Memahami cara membuat dan mengukur kinerja kegiatan promosi
Bersedia di tempatkan di Gresik, Jawa Timur

title: Staf Fiskal
description: Perusahaan yang berdiri sejak 1953, merupakan salah satu perusahaan tekstil ternama dan berpengalaman di Indonesia. Tak hanya itu, BEHAESTEX juga dikenal sebagai salah satu produsen busana muslim terbesar di dunia, khususnya pada kategori produk sarung tenun berkualitas. BEHAESTEX memiliki keunggulan dan keunikan tersendiri, yakni sebagai produsen yang melestarikan dan mengembangkan alat tenun tradisional budaya khas Indonesia yang dikenal sebagai ATBM (Alat Tenun Bukan Mesin). Produk sarung dan kain yang dihasilkan dari ATBM tersebut merupakan produk pekerjaan tangan atau handicrafts. Hal ini menjadikan BEHAESTEX berpredikat sebagai produsen sarung dan kain ATBM terbaik dan terbesar di dunia. BEHAESTEX sebagai produsen tekstil yang populer dengan merk BHS dan ATLAS telah mendistribusikan produk-produknya ke seluruh Indonesia dan berbagai negara di ASEAN, Timur Tengah, Afrika, dan belahan dunia lainnya.

company.name: PT BEHAESTEX
company.description:
Perusahaan yang berdiri sejak 1953, merupakan salah satu perusahaan tekstil ternama dan berpengalaman di Indonesia. Tak hanya itu, BEHAESTEX juga dikenal sebagai salah satu produsen busana muslim terbesar di dunia, khususnya pada kategori produk sarung tenun berkualitas.

BEHAESTEX memiliki keunggulan dan keunikan tersendiri, yakni sebagai produsen yang melestarikan dan mengembangkan alat tenun tradisional budaya khas Indonesia yang dikenal sebagai ATBM (Alat Tenun Bukan Mesin). Produk sarung dan kain yang dihasilkan dari ATBM tersebut merupakan produk pekerjaan tangan atau handicrafts. Hal ini menjadikan BEHAESTEX berpredikat sebagai produsen sarung dan kain ATBM terbaik dan terbesar di dunia.

BEHAESTEX sebagai produsen tekstil yang populer dengan merk BHS dan ATLAS telah mendistribusikan produk-produknya ke seluruh Indonesia dan berbagai negara di ASEAN, Timur Tengah, Afrika, dan belahan dunia lainnya.

BHS
Sarung BHS merupakan warisan hasanah budaya nusantara yang dihasilkan dari helai benang berkualitas. Ditenun oleh tangan terampil yang berpengalaman puluhan tahun yang menghasilkan karya seni bernilai tinggi. Menghadirkan keragaman dan keunikan motif dari perpaduan corak dan warna, sehingga tercipta karya budaya yang membanggakan. Hal inilah yang membuat Sarung BHS menjadi salah satu ikon budaya bangsa Indonesia.

ATLAS
Sarung Atlas dihasilkan melalui proses teknologi mutakhir. Dirancang oleh tenaga ahli profesional di bidangnya. Perpaduan seni dan teknologi menjadikan produk-produk yang dihasilkan berkualitas terbaik. Keragaman varian serta keindahan motif dan warna tersusun anggun dalam setiap produk yang dihasilkan.

requirements: Usia maksimal 25 tahun.
Pendidikan minimal S1 Jurusan Ekonomi, Pajak, atau Akuntansi.
Terbuka untuk Freshgraduate. Diutamakan berpengalaman di bidang yang sama.
Memiliki kemampuan mengoperasikan Ms. Office.
Dapat melakukan penyusunan dan analisa laporan keuangan.
Memiliki sertifikasi Brevet menjadi nilai tambah.
Jujur, teliti, memiliki kemampuan analisa yang baik, dan dapat bekerjasama dalam tim.

title: Estimator (Jakarta Selatan)
description: mencakup penerimaan dokumen atau gambar serta perhitungan kuantitas, spesifikasi, harga material, lingkup pekerjaan, subkontraktor, dan manhours untuk keperluan penawaran (tender) di Divisi Konstruksi dan Fabrikasi. Juga bertanggung jawab menghitung MTO (material take-off), harga site cost, dan break down price untuk tender maupun proyek konstruksi dan fabrikasi. Selain itu, membuat penawaran dan dokumen proposal, menjalin jaringan dengan supplier untuk memperoleh informasi harga dan spesifikasi material terkini, serta menghadiri rapat klarifikasi atau tender jika diperlukan. Tugas lainnya meliputi mempelajari administrasi bidding instruction, menyusun surat penawaran dan dokumen tender, serta mengadministrasikan dokumen, surat, dan gambar terkait hasil estimasi proyek yang mengikuti tender sesuai ketentuan yang berlaku.

company.name: PT. Epiterma Mas Indonesia
company.description: PT. Epiterma Mas Indonesia was established on 14 March 1987. Now very well known company in steel fabrication construction, material handling equipment and to support excellent products and punctual delivery times. We have experience for over 37 years in domestic and overseas mining projects. To compete with other similiar companies, we have built a strong commitment towards to the customer’s requirements by following International Standard related to the nature of business. In 2025, Quality Management (ISO 9001:2015) and Health & Safety Management (ISO 45001:2018) were implemented to achieve this commitment.
company.address: Bekasi International Industrial Estate, Lippo Cikarang, Jl. Inti II No.12

Menghitung MTO (material take off) untuk tender, konstruksi atau fabrikasi perhitungan harga site cost dan break down price.
Membuat penawaran dan membantu menyiapkan dokumen (proposal) untuk tender, penawaran pada Divisi Konstruksi  maupun Divisi Fabrikasi.
Menjalin hubungan/jaringan ke supplier/toko/pabrik untuk informasi harga, spesifikasi material dan up date daftar harga material untuk keperluan estimasi proposal tender.
